summary.span: 表示包含文件和目录的独立存储区。

span.span: Represents an isolated storage area containing files and directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此对象对应于特定的独立存储范围，其中的文件由 对象表示。This object corresponds to a specific isolated storage scope, where files represented by objects exist. 应用程序可以使用独立存储将数据保存在文件系统自身的隔离部分中，而无需在文件系统中指定特定路径。Applications can use isolated storage to save data in their own isolated portion of the file system, without having to specify a particular path within the file system. 由于独立存储区的作用域为特定程序集，因此，大多数其他托管代码将无法访问您的代码的数据（高度信任的托管代码和管理工具可以访问其他程序集中的存储）。Since isolated stores are scoped to particular assemblies, most other managed code will not be able to access your code's data (highly trusted managed code and administration tools can access stores from other assemblies). 非托管代码可以访问任何独立的存储区。Unmanaged code can access any isolated stores. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [独立存储](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)。For more information, see [Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md). 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/ 块中调用其 `catch` 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 独立存储不适用于 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 相反，使用 `Windows.Storage` API 中包含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空间中的应用程序数据类来存储本地数据和文件。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心的 [应用程序数据](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center. ## Examples 下面的代码示例展示了如何在独立存储中创建文件和目录。The following code example illustrates how to create files and directories in an isolated store. 首先，将检索一个按用户、域和程序集隔离的存储区，并将其放置在 `isoStore` 的变量中。First, a store that is isolated by user, domain, and assembly is retrieved and placed in the `isoStore` variable. 然后调用 方法来创建目录， 类的两个实例在这些目录中创建文件。The method is then called to create directories, and two instances of the class create files in these directories. [!code-csharp[Conceptual.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.isolatedstorage/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Conceptual.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.isolatedstorage/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取独立存储的当前大小。

value.span: 独立存储范围中当前正在使用的存储区的总字节数。

span.span: The total number of bytes of storage currently in use within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示独立存储范围内所有文件和目录的总使用量。Represents the total usage of all files and directories within the isolated storage scope. 对于加入漫游用户配置文件的商店，无法准确确定当前大小。The current size cannot be accurately determined for stores that are participating in a roaming user profile. 因为漫游配置文件通常缓存在多个客户端计算机上，之后与服务器同步，所以无法为此类存储强制执行配额，并且不会报告当前大小。Because roaming profiles are often cached on multiple client machines and later synchronized with a server, quotas cannot be enforced for such stores and the current size is not reported. [如何：使用独立存储来预见空间不足的情况](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)示例演示如何使用 属性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 的属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 有关此示例的完整上下文，请参阅 概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 `Dispose`后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 在释放对 的最后一个引用之前，请始终调用 Dispose。Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收调用 对象的 方法之前，不会释放 正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开一个独立的存储文件，使用它将信息写入流，关闭该文件，然后使用 方法释放所有资源。The following code example opens an isolated storage file, uses it to write information to a stream, closes the file, and then uses the method to release all resources. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通配符字符必须在 `searchPattern`的最后一个元素中。Wildcard characters must only be in the final element of a `searchPattern`. 例如，"directory1/\* etc\*" 是有效的搜索字符串，但 "\*etc\*/目录" 不是。For instance, "directory1/\*etc\*" is a valid search string, but "\*etc\*/directory" is not. `searchPattern` "Project\Data \*" 将从独立存储范围中的数据开始，为项目的所有子目录提供。The `searchPattern` "Project\Data\*" will give all subdirectories of Project beginning with Data in the isolated storage scope. `searchPattern` "\*" 将返回根目录中的所有目录。The `searchPattern` "\*" will return all directories located in the root. 有关搜索字符串条件的完整说明，请参阅 类。For complete description of search string criteria, see the class. 有关获取文件名的信息，请参阅 方法。For information on getting file names, see the method. summary.span: 获取与调用代码的应用程序标识对应的用户范围的独立存储。

span.span: Obtains user-scoped isolated storage corresponding to the calling code's application identity.

returns.span: 与基于调用代码的程序集标识的独立存储范围对应的对象。

span.span: An object corresponding to the isolated storage scope based on the calling code's assembly identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时，与应用程序关联的所有程序集都使用相同的独立存储区。All assemblies associated with an application use the same isolated store when using this method. 仅当可以确定应用程序标识时（例如，当应用程序通过 ClickOnce 部署发布或基于 Silverlight 的应用程序时），才能使用此方法。This method can be used only when the application identity can be determined - for example, when the application is published through ClickOnce deployment or is a Silverlight-based application. 如果尝试在基于 ClickOnce 或 Silverlight 的应用程序外部使用此方法，则将收到 异常，因为无法确定调用方的应用程序标识。If you attempt to use this method outside a ClickOnce or Silverlight-based application, you will receive an exception, because the application identity of the caller cannot be determined. 在功能上等效于以下代码： is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/remarks.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/remarks.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/remarks.vb#21)] 在此代码中，`GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)` 的 `applicationIdentity` 参数 `null`。In this code, the `applicationIdentity` parameter for `GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)` is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，应用程序可以显式请求更大的配额大小（以字节为单位）。The method enables an application to explicitly request a larger quota size in bytes. 新的配额大小不得小于当前配额大小，因为只允许增加配额。The new quota size must not be smaller than the current quota size, because only quota increases are allowed. 无论何时调用 方法，独立存储都将调用 方法。Whenever the method is called, isolated storage calls the method. 您可以通过创建一个自定义 对象来实现策略决策，该对象将重写 方法，以便对象可以基于 的对象执行策略决策。You can implement policy decisions by creating a custom object that overrides the method so that the object can perform policy decisions based on a object. 如果没有自定义 对象，则会拒绝配额增加请求，因为 的默认实现将返回 `false`。If there is no custom object, the quota increase request is denied, because the default implementation for returns `false`. 目前，.NET Framework 中的任何主机均不提供此自定义，因此 总是返回 `false`。Currently, none of the hosts in the .NET Framework provide this customization, so always returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用字节数受管理员设置的独立存储配额的限制。The number of bytes available is constrained by the isolated storage quota set by the administrator. 配额是在安全策略中根据证据进行配置的，因此，如果使用不同的证据运行，则相同的代码可能会收到不同的配额。Quota is configured in security policy on the basis of evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence. 例如，从本地运行的应用程序，也可能会收到不同的配额。For example, an application that is run locally and also from a share on an intranet would likely receive different quotas. [如何：使用独立存储来预见空间不足的情况](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)示例演示如何使用 属性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 的属性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 有关此示例的完整上下文，请参阅 概述。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. summary.span: 移除独立存储区范围及其所有内容。

span.span: Removes the isolated storage scope and all its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 此方法不可撤销删除整个作用域以及包含的所有目录和文件。This method irrevocably removes the entire scope and all contained directories and files. 如果存储中的任何目录或文件正在使用中，则对存储的删除尝试将失败，并且存储将标记为要删除。If any of the directories or files in the store are in use, the removal attempt for the store fails and the store is marked for removal. 任何后续修改存储区的尝试都会引发 。Any subsequent attempts to modify the store throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法，以便在清空独立存储文件的内容后将其删除。The following code example uses the method to delete the isolated storage file after its contents have been emptied. [如何：删除独立存储中的存储](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-delete-stores-in-isolated-storage.md)示例还演示了如何使用 方法。The [How to: Delete Stores in Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-delete-stores-in-isolated-storage.md) example also demonstrates the use of the method.
